pagename: Money making guide/Crafting runes at Ourania Altar
title: Crafting runes at Ourania Altar

properties.name: description
properties.value: Money making at the Ourania altar varies greatly depending on the player's Runecraft levels. This is because the %chance to make various rune types changes depending on Runecraft levels, as shown by the chart below. This guide assumes that the player has 70 runecraft and has completed the medium Ardougne diary.

content:
Crafting runes at the Ourania altar
Requirements
Skills
70 for rates as shown. Higher levels recommended to craft higher level runes and use Runecraft pouches
High and recommended
71 strongly recommended
75+ recommended
Items
  • Small through giant Runecraft pouches
  • Protective gear mixed with weight-reducing clothing
  • Full Graceful outfit
  • Dust battlestaff
  • Rune pouch (Fill with law, astral, and mind runes)
  • Some food if low level
  • Stamina potions
Quest
None, but completion of Lunar Diplomacy to get access to Lunar Spellbook (Ourania Teleport) is strongly recommended.
Other
Completed Medium Ardougne diary recommended (10-25% more runes created depending on rune)
Results
ProfitExperience gained
311,278 See Ourania altar experience rates
4,300

Money making at the Ourania altar varies greatly depending on the player's Runecraft levels. This is because the %chance to make various rune types changes depending on Runecraft levels, as shown by the chart below. This guide assumes that the player has 70 runecraft and has completed the medium Ardougne diary.

A simple way to find the calculate the gp/hour for a given runecraft level is to simply multiply the essence processed per hour (2600) by the gp/ess entry in the table below.


See the Runecraft training - Ourania altar page for a completed guide to using the Ourania altar; The method for gaining the most GP is the same as the XP training method. For more information on Rune distribution see the Ourania Altar page.

Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
